downloadTitle: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2013 Cumulative Update 5
downloadDescription: Host Integration Server 2013 Cumulative Update 5 installation package
detailsSection:
Cumulative Update 5 for Microsoft Host Integration Server 2013 contains hotfixes for issues that were fixed after the release of Host Integration Server 2013. We recommend that you test the cumulative update before you deploy it in a production environment. This cumulative update (CU) is a rollup update that contains the following items:
  • All previously released hotfixes for Host Integration Server 2013.
Notes:
  • This cumulative update does not contain fixes for Microsoft Enterprise Single Sign-On (SSO). Therefore, this update does not apply to stand-alone SSO servers.
systemRequirementsSection: These cumulative updates require that Host Integration Server 2013, or a Host Integration 2013 Client be installed on the system.   These updates can also be applied on top of previous updates.  They are supported on the same operating systems as Host Integration Server 2013.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, and click Next.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
